headline: M&A target stocks surge in bet on Wall Street dealmaking rebound
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A group of US stocks that Citigroup Inc. considers to be acquisition targets is staging an outsize rally, underscoring Wall Street’s renewed optimism that dealmaking will revive along with the economy as tariff worries ease.Most Read from BloombergHow a Highway Became San Francisco’s Newest ParkAmerica, ‘Nation of Porches’Maryland’s Credit Rating Gets Downgraded as Governor Blames Trump NJ Transit Train Engineers Strike, Disrupting Travel to NYCNYC Commuters Brace for Chaos as NJ
